attributes.long-description:
2014 Winner Best Shooter - the Game Awards
In Far Cry 4, players find themselves in Kyrat, a breathtaking, perilous and wild region of the Himalayas struggling under the regime of a despotic self-appointed king. Using a vast array of weapons, vehicles, and animals, players will write their own story across an exotic open-world landscape.

London is falling. How long will you survive? The nail-biting survival experience of ZombiU™ is now available on the PS4™ system. Test your will to survive, but beware: one wrong move can cause you to lose everything.
PURE SURVIVAL HORROR
You never know when you’ll find more weapons, ammo, first aid, or food.
PERMADEATH
Once you die, your character joins the horde of undead shambling through London. You’ll come back as an entirely new character and try to survive, again.
BUG-OUT BAG
Your bug-out bag holds all your tools, inventory, first aid kits, maps, and more. If you die, your bag stays with your old character, who is now a zombie.



HD Video Output:1080p
Singstar® Mic: Not Used


Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2014 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Far Cry, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Based on Crytek’s original Far Cry directed by Cevat Yerli. Powered by Crytek’s technology “CryEngine.”
